text:
The p4sync task uses a String for the force attribute.  Logically, this is just 
a boolean.  The task should be modified to use boolean instead of String so we 
can use the standard Ant mechanism for setting up with attribute.
creator: aarora@alumni.umich.edu
bodewig@apache.org
text:
This change would break backwards compatibility - in older build files any value
other than an empty string means "add the -f switch".  If we made the change you
suggest, the builds would show different behavior in Ant 1.4.1 and Ant 1.5.

creator: leslie.hughes@rubus.com
text:
Actually, you'll find all the P4 suite of tasks do this. Let's just say some of 
us were still learning at the time.

--Les
